apps/spectator.title: Spectator App
apps/spectator.description: The main SportRadar application for spectators to track race participants.

architecture/monorepo-structure.title: Monorepo Structure
architecture/monorepo-structure.description: SportRadar uses a pnpm monorepo with Turborepo for build orchestration.

architecture/overview.title: Architecture Overview
architecture/overview.description: SportRadar is designed as a modern, scalable web application for real-time event tracking.

architecture/tech-stack.title: Tech Stack
architecture/tech-stack.description: A comprehensive overview of the technologies used in SportRadar.

features/ar-view.title: AR View (3D Terrain)
features/ar-view.description: The ARView component provides 3D terrain visualization using geo-three and Three.js.

features/map-component.title: Map Component
features/map-component.description: The Map component is the core visualization element of the Spectator app.

features/simulation-system.title: Simulation System
features/simulation-system.description: The simulation system allows virtual athletes to traverse routes for testing and development.

getting-started/development.title: Development
getting-started/development.description: This guide covers the development workflow for SportRadar.

getting-started/installation.title: Installation
getting-started/installation.description: This guide will help you set up the SportRadar development environment.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Welcome to SportRadar - an ultra-trail event spectator application that displays participant locations on a map in real-time.

packages/auth.title: @sportradar/auth
packages/auth.description: Supabase authentication package for SportRadar applications.

packages/config.title: @sportradar/config
packages/config.description: Shared configuration files for SportRadar applications.

packages/ui.title: @sportradar/ui
packages/ui.description: Shared UI components for SportRadar applications.

packages/utils.title: @sportradar/utils
packages/utils.description: Shared utilities for SportRadar applications, primarily geographic calculations.
